ygData.subject: Re: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the Orc camps in South Ro would be perfect at your level.  With one other person you could hold a camp with out a problem.  When you are ready you can
ygData.messageBody:
I think the Orc camps in South Ro would be perfect at your level. With one
other person you could hold a camp with out a problem. When you are ready
you can then move right to the near by Derv camp. The only problem is
actually getting there at your level; the North half of So Ro can be
dangerous.

Rizzin Diamoure
E'ci

----- Original Message -----
From: <srutkowski@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 28, 1999 8:07 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Hunting Grounds


> From: srutkowski@...
>
>
>
> Probably been covered plenty of times, I know... .but....
>
> I'm a level 9 enchanter and I'm looking for a few places to level fast
without
> hurting my faction with Indigo Brotherhood (so Crushbone is out). I know
that I
> could do the crushbone belt and shoulderpad quest to get some good exp
from
> buying the pads, but I'm not really sure if that will hurt my faction or
not.
>
> I really want to get to 12 (Charm woo hoo).
>
>
